00002 interface IReader {
00003     public function ReadInt($length); //reads an integer of size $length
00004     public function Read($length); //reads a $length-character long string
00005     public function GetSubString($start,$length=FALSE);//gets a SubString of the resource
00006     public function GetPosition(); //gets the current position of the reader.
00007     public function Seek($position); //jump to an absolute position in the file
00008     public function Skip($count); //skip a number of bytes in the reader
